Enid Stacy (10 June 1868 - 4 Septemba 1903) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị onye bekee.  A mụrụ Stacy na 10 June 1868 na Westbury, Gloucestershire, ọkpara nke onye na-ese ihe Irish Henry Stacy na nwunye ya bụ Rose Deeley ụmụ anọ.  Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Bristol na 1881.  A zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ Ndị Kraịst;  nwanne ya nwoke nyeere aka chọta Bristol na Clifton Christian Socialist Society na nna ya mechara tinye aka na Bristol Socialist Society.  Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Bristol, ebe ọ meriri agụmakwụkwọ Whitworth, wee bụrụ onye nkuzi na Redland High School for Girls.  N'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere Katharine St John Conway, bụ onye ya na ya nwere mmasị na John Ruskin na Anglo-Catholicism.
Stacy dekwara akwụkwọ ugboro ugboro maka The Clarion wee sonye na National Union of Women's Suffrage Societies
N'afọ 1896, ọ zutere onye isi ndị Anglo-Catholic Percy Widdrington na International Congress of Socialists
Ha lụrụ na Mee na-esote, na mbụ biri na Newcastle upon Tyne, mgbe e mesịrị na Calderbrook
Ọbụna mgbe ọ mụsịrị nwa, Stacy nọrọ ọnwa isii n'afọ na-eme njem ma na-akụzi ihe gbasara ndị Socialist na ndị inyom, ọ nwụrụ na mberede na 4 Septemba 1903.
